languages.text: Стоя перед {mf|тем|той}, кого прежде называла сво{mf|им|ей} Лорд-капитаном, Идира Тласс провела последние мгновения жизни в мольбах забрать ее с собой. Она готова была присягнуть звездному божеству, отринуть Человечество... Но она более была не нужна хозя{mf|ину|йке}. Осколок К'тан, питавший нелюбовь ко всякому проявлению силы Имматериума, истребил ее с особым тщанием.

Standing before the one whom she had once called her Lord Captain, Idira Tlass spent the last moments of her life pleading to go with {mf|him|her}. She was ready to pledge her allegiance to the Star God, to abandon Humanity... But her {mf|master|mistress} had no use for her anymore. The C'tan Shard, feeling antipathy toward any mark of the Immaterium's power, undid her with exceptional thoroughness.
languages.original_text: Стоя перед {mf|тем|той}, кого прежде называла сво{mf|им|ей} Лорд-капитаном, Идира Тласс провела последние мгновения жизни в мольбах забрать ее с собой. Она готова была присягнуть звездному божеству, отринуть Человечество... Но она более была не нужна хозя{mf|ину|йке}. Осколок К'тан, питавший нелюбовь ко всякому проявлению силы Имматериума, истребил ее с особым тщанием.

traits.locale_text: Standing before the one, who she once called her Lord Captain, Idira Tlass spent the last moments of her life pleading to take her with {mf|him|her}. She was ready to pledge her allegiance to the star deity, to abandon Humanity... but her {mf|master|mistress} had no use of her anymore. C'Tan Shard, feeling antipathy for any mark of Immaterium's power undid her with great thoroughness.

Standing before the one, who she once called her Lord Captain, Idira Tlass spent the last moments of her life pleading to take her with {mf|him|her}. She was ready to pledge her allegiance to the star deity, to abandon Humanity... but her {mf|master|mistress} had no use of her anymore. C'Tan Shard, feeling antipathy for any mark of Immaterium's power undid her with great thoroughness.

Standing before the one who she once called her Lord Captain, Idira Tlass spent the last moments of her life pleading to go with {mf|him|her}. She was ready to pledge her allegiance to the Star God, to abandon Humanity... But her {mf|master|mistress} had no use for her anymore. The C'tan Shard, feeling antipathy toward any mark of the Immaterium's power, undid her with exceptional thoroughness.

Standing before the one who she once called her Lord Captain, Idira Tlass spent the last moments of her life pleading to go with {mf|him|her}. She was ready to pledge her allegiance to the Star God, to abandon Humanity... But her {mf|master|mistress} had no use for her anymore. The C'tan Shard, feeling antipathy toward any mark of the Immaterium's power, undid her with exceptional thoroughness.

Standing before the one whom she had once called her Lord Captain, Idira Tlass spent the last moments of her life pleading to go with {mf|him|her}. She was ready to pledge her allegiance to the Star God, to abandon Humanity... But her {mf|master|mistress} had no use for her anymore. The C'tan Shard, feeling antipathy toward any mark of the Immaterium's power, undid her with exceptional thoroughness.

Standing before the one whom she had once called her Lord Captain, Idira Tlass spent the last moments of her life pleading to go with {mf|him|her}. She was ready to pledge her allegiance to the Star God, to abandon Humanity... But her {mf|master|mistress} had no use for her anymore. The C'tan Shard, feeling antipathy toward any mark of the Immaterium's power, undid her with exceptional thoroughness.

languages.text: 在生命的最后时刻，伊迪拉·特拉斯站在那曾被她称为“舰长大人”的人面前，恳求愿意追随{mf|他|她}。她准备宣誓效忠星神，放弃人类……然而，她的主人已经不再需要她了。星神碎片厌恶亚空间之力的一切表现，以异常彻底的方式摧毁了她。
languages.original_text: Standing before the one whom she had once called her Lord Captain, Idira Tlass spent the last moments of her life pleading to go with {mf|him|her}. She was ready to pledge her allegiance to the Star God, to abandon Humanity... But her {mf|master|mistress} had no use for her anymore. The C'tan Shard, feeling antipathy toward any mark of the Immaterium's power, undid her with exceptional thoroughness.

traits.locale_text: 在生命的最后时刻，伊迪拉·特拉斯站在那曾被她称为“舰长大人”的人面前，恳求愿意追随{mf|他|她}。她准备宣誓效忠星神，放弃人类……然而，她的主人已经不再需要她了。星神碎片厌恶亚空间之力的一切表现，以异常彻底的方式摧毁了她。

languages.text: Idira Tlass stand vor {mf|dem Mann, den|der Frau, die} sie einst ihren Lord Captain genannt hatte, und verbrachte die letzten Augenblicke ihres Lebens mit flehentlichen Bitten, {mf|ihn|sie} begleiten zu dürfen. Sie wäre bereit gewesen, dem Sternengott die Treue zu schwören, die Menschheit aufzugeben ... Doch {mf|ihr Herr|ihre Herrin} hatte keine Verwendung mehr für sie. Das C'tan-Fragment, das Antipathie gegen jede Spur der Macht des Immateriums empfand, löschte sie mit außergewöhnlicher Gründlichkeit aus.
languages.original_text: Standing before the one whom she had once called her Lord Captain, Idira Tlass spent the last moments of her life pleading to go with {mf|him|her}. She was ready to pledge her allegiance to the Star God, to abandon Humanity... But her {mf|master|mistress} had no use for her anymore. The C'tan Shard, feeling antipathy toward any mark of the Immaterium's power, undid her with exceptional thoroughness.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass stand vor {mf|dem Mann, den|der Frau, die} sie einst ihren Lord Captain genannt hatte, und verbrachte die letzten Augenblicke ihres Lebens mit flehentlichen Bitten, {mf|ihn|sie} begleiten zu dürfen. Sie wäre bereit gewesen, dem Sternengott die Treue zu schwören, die Menschheit aufzugeben ... Doch {mf|ihr Herr|ihre Herrin} hatte keine Verwendung mehr für sie. Das C'tan-Fragment, das Antipathie gegen jede Spur der Macht des Immateriums empfand, löschte sie mit außergewöhnlicher Gründlichkeit aus.

languages.text: Idira Tlass passa les derniers moments de sa vie à supplier {mf|celui|celle} qu'elle appelait autrefois {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine} pour qu'{mf|il|elle} lui permette de l'accompagner. Elle était prête à jurer allégeance au Dieu Stellaire et à abandonner l'humanité... mais {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse} n'avait plus besoin d'elle. L'Écharde C'tan, hostile envers toute marque de puissance de l'Immaterium, l'annihila avec une rigueur exceptionnelle.
languages.original_text: Standing before the one whom she had once called her Lord Captain, Idira Tlass spent the last moments of her life pleading to go with {mf|him|her}. She was ready to pledge her allegiance to the Star God, to abandon Humanity... But her {mf|master|mistress} had no use for her anymore. The C'tan Shard, feeling antipathy toward any mark of the Immaterium's power, undid her with exceptional thoroughness.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass passa les derniers moments de sa vie à supplier {mf|celui|celle} qu'elle appelait autrefois {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine} pour qu’{mf|il|elle} lui permette de l’accompagner. Elle était prête à jurer allégeance au Dieu Stellaire et à abandonner l'humanité... mais {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse} n'avait plus besoin d’elle. L'Écharde C'tan, hostile envers toute marque de puissance de l'Immaterium, l’annihila avec une rigueur exceptionnelle.

languages.text: Idira Tlass pasó los últimos momentos de su vida frente a quien había llamado Lord Capitán, rogándole que le permitiera acompañar{mf|le|la}. Estaba preparada para jurar lealtad al dios estelar, para abandonar a la Humanidad... pero su am{mf|o|a} ya no la necesitaba. El fragmento de C'tan, con su aversión innata hacia todos los poderes del Inmaterio, la deshizo hasta que no quedó ningún rastro de ella.
languages.original_text: Standing before the one whom she had once called her Lord Captain, Idira Tlass spent the last moments of her life pleading to go with {mf|him|her}. She was ready to pledge her allegiance to the Star God, to abandon Humanity... But her {mf|master|mistress} had no use for her anymore. The C'tan Shard, feeling antipathy toward any mark of the Immaterium's power, undid her with exceptional thoroughness.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass pasó los últimos momentos de su vida frente a quien había llamado Lord Capitán, rogándole que le permitiera acompañar{mf|le|la}. Estaba preparada para jurar lealtad al dios estelar, para abandonar a la Humanidad... pero su am{mf|o|a} ya no la necesitaba. El fragmento de C'tan, con su aversión innata hacia todos los poderes del Inmaterio, la deshizo hasta que no quedó ningún rastro de ella.

languages.text: かつてロード・キャプテンと呼んだ人物の前に立ち、イディラ・タラースは人生の最後の瞬間を{mf|彼|彼女}と共に過ごした 。彼女は星々の神に忠誠を誓い、人類を捨てる準備ができていた...。しかし、マスターにとって彼女はもう用済みだった。非物質世界の力の痕跡に反感を抱いたク＝タン・シャードは、並外れた手際で彼女を解体した。
languages.original_text: Standing before the one whom she had once called her Lord Captain, Idira Tlass spent the last moments of her life pleading to go with {mf|him|her}. She was ready to pledge her allegiance to the Star God, to abandon Humanity... But her {mf|master|mistress} had no use for her anymore. The C'tan Shard, feeling antipathy toward any mark of the Immaterium's power, undid her with exceptional thoroughness.

traits.locale_text: かつてロード・キャプテンと呼んだ人物の前に立ち、イディラ・タラースは人生の最後の瞬間を{mf|彼|彼女}と共に過ごした 。彼女は星々の神に忠誠を誓い、人類を捨てる準備ができていた...。しかし、マスターにとって彼女はもう用済みだった。非物質世界の力の痕跡に反感を抱いたク＝タン・シャードは、並外れた手際で彼女を解体した。

languages.text: İdira Tlass, bir zamanlar Lord Kaptan diye hitap ettiği kişinin karşısında dururken son anlarını kendisini yanında götürmesi için yalvararak geçirdi. Yıldız Tanrı'ya bağlılık yemini etmeye, İnsanlığı terk etmeye hazır olsa da artık efendisinin işine yaramazdı. Tindiyar'ın gücüne dair her türlü işarete antipati duyan C'tan Parçası, İdira'nın sonunu özenle ve net bir şekilde getirdi.
languages.original_text: Standing before the one whom she had once called her Lord Captain, Idira Tlass spent the last moments of her life pleading to go with {mf|him|her}. She was ready to pledge her allegiance to the Star God, to abandon Humanity... But her {mf|master|mistress} had no use for her anymore. The C'tan Shard, feeling antipathy toward any mark of the Immaterium's power, undid her with exceptional thoroughness.

traits.locale_text: İdira Tlass, bir zamanlar Lord Kaptan diye hitap ettiği kişinin karşısında dururken, son anlarını onunla birlikte gitmek için yalvararak geçirdi. Yıldız Tanrı'ya bağlılık yemini etmeye, İnsanlığı terk etmeye hazırdı ancak artık efendisinin işine yaramazdı. Tindiyar'ın gücüne dair her türlü işarete antipati hisseden C'tan Parçası, İdira'nın sonunu özenle ve net bir şekilde getirdi.
